Text:
Out of the way, pigs, unless you
want to be wiped out without a trace.

I must play an active role and stand
out this time.

You may be a Demon Lord, but no one
can escape the binding of these
threads.

You have to grab the good things for
yourself.
My loyalty is yours and yours alone, Master!

Are you from Japan too, Mr. Slime?
Oh, I'm so happy I met you!

Great Rimuru, would you prefer to
have me or Shion serving you?

For the disruption you've caused,
I am removing you from this forest.

Greetings! I am the one and only
Dragonoid, also known as the Destroyer,
the Demon Lord Milim Nava!

Look at the other person and say something?
I will forgive you for speaking, but choose your words carefully.

Bwahahahaha! Oh, you want to play
with me?
I can't help but kill that which is unmistakably evil.
I henceforth swear allegiance to Queen Ramiris.
I'm Rimuru the slime! I'm not a bad slime!
Devour all! Chaos Eater!
Can you hear me, small one? Answer me!
Flare Circle
Milim...
Ta-da! I am one of th—
Elemental Colossus, activate!

Who are you calling a runt? You
wanna be murdered?
I must complete my first job perfectly to impress Great Rimuru
If we're talking loyalty to Great Rimuru, I'm as loyal as any of you!

It’s been a while since my left hand was numb.
I’ll show you a special thank you.
GAHAHAHA! I, VELDA, THE STORM DRAGON, LIVE AGAIN!
Devour all! Beelzebub!

You wretched dragon!
Why do you always have to interfere?!
And don't tell me you've even forgotten my name?
We just have to become True Maids, no matter what!

You've stayed by my side, and you always make me so happy to be around you. 
To me, that's the best gift of all.
